headline: Thematic Analysis of Consumer Experiences with VPN Services
summary: This analysis explores consumer experiences and expectations regarding VPN services, focusing on unmet needs related to accessibility and reliability.

themes.title: Reliability Expectations
themes.description: Participants express a strong desire for VPN services that consistently perform well without interruptions.

quotes.quote: I would be curious to learn more about it.

themes.title: Frustration with Current Limitations
themes.description: Participants share frustrations regarding their current VPN services, particularly related to accessibility and connection issues.

quotes.quote: When adjustments made still not totally secure.
I can't access Home Depot in my hometown U.S. from Panama.
Sometimes need to restart computer to be able to access it.

themes.title: Interest in Alternatives
themes.description: Participants show a willingness to explore alternative VPN services that promise better performance and reliability.

quotes.quote: I would want to know what the price is.
I would like to try that service out.

themes.title: Satisfaction with Current Services
themes.description: Despite some frustrations, many participants express overall satisfaction with their current VPN solutions.

quotes.quote: Good I would not have problem.

themes.title: Concerns about Pricing
themes.description: Participants frequently mention pricing as a significant factor influencing their decisions regarding VPN services.

quotes.quote: Since I've not had any issues with Bitdefender, I think the cost of this service would be my primary concern.
I would ask what the price is.
If I see that it’s at a cheap price, I might look into it.
